name: Coliseum Central Young Professional (Daily Latte Routine)
description: A 25–39-year-old professional living in Hampton’s core ZIPs who wants a consistent, elevated morning coffee that feels personal (signature flavors, quality espresso) without paying luxury-premium prices. Ideal because they form repeat routines and influence coworkers/friends through habit and convenience.
valueProposition: Fast, made-here specialty coffee with signature flavors—reliable enough for a daily routine and distinct enough to feel like a treat.

promise.text: Your weekday coffee upgrade—fast, consistent, and made-here.
promise.trigger: When chain coffee stops feeling worth it and you want a better daily ritual.
promise.process: Order at the counter, choose a signature flavor or classic espresso drink, pair with a quick bite, grab-and-go.
promise.pricingAnchors: $6–$9 signature latte; $5–$12 add-on food.
promise.processGuarantees: Consistent quality, friendly service pace, and a clear ‘in-and-out’ experience during peak mornings.

messageSpine.headline: Make your morning coffee feel intentional—without slowing down.
benefitBullets: Signature flavors that taste ‘made here’
Reliable morning cadence for busy schedules
messageSpine.objectionHandling: If you’re worried it’ll take too long, our counter-service flow is built for weekday mornings.
messageSpine.proof: Local regulars choose Sweet Beans for a consistent cup and a more personal experience than chains.

name: Mid-Career Homeowner Commuter (Coffee + Breakfast Stop)
description: A 35–54-year-old homeowner who wants a dependable one-stop morning solution—coffee plus a quick bite—before work, school drop-off, or errands. Ideal because they purchase for more than one person and build repeat weekday behavior.

promise.text: Coffee + breakfast made easy in one stop.
promise.trigger: When mornings get tight and you need a dependable routine for the household.
promise.process: Quick order → pick up coffee and food together → back on the road.
promise.pricingAnchors: $10–$18 typical ‘coffee + food’ ticket.
promise.processGuarantees: Clear menu logic, predictable turnaround, and consistent drink execution.

messageSpine.headline: One stop. Better coffee. Less morning chaos.
benefitBullets: Coffee and food together—no extra stops

messageSpine.objectionHandling: If you’re comparing to fast chains, this is ‘better value per stop’ because you get quality plus convenience.
messageSpine.proof: Sweet Beans is positioned as a community-driven specialty café—personal without being precious.
